prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing congratulations greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "I have become the version of me that I love 

Highly successful entrepreneur who has overcome a lot of obstacles "
Style: âœ¨ Smart Style
Tone: ðŸŒŸ Inspirational - motivating and uplifting
To: Mursal
From: Mursal
Message: "Thank you for gifting me with a great future and present and past"

Reference: "Cute "

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the motivating and uplifting tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way






- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "congratulations" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a luminous and ethereal watercolor style, depicting two overlapping silhouettes. The background silhouette, rendered in soft, muted grays and cool blues, subtly evokes past struggles, like a fading memory. Emerging from it, the foreground silhouette is vibrant and alive with a radiant kintsugi effect, where delicate, glowing gold leaf lines trace the contours, symbolizing the beautiful mending of past wounds into sources of strength. The surrounding space is filled with a gentle wash of warm, celebratory colorsâ€”peach, soft rose, and sunny goldâ€”blending seamlessly into one another. Delicate, hand-painted wildflowers, like resilient poppies and joyful sunflowers, appear to grow from the golden lines, symbolizing new growth and blossoming self-love. The overall effect is deeply personal, tender, and triumphant, capturing the beauty of a soul gratefully acknowledging its own journey.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a congratulations card with motivating and uplifting tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a luminous and ethereal watercolor style, depicting two overlapping silhouettes. The background silhouette, rendered in soft, muted grays and cool blues, subtly evokes past struggles, like a fading memory. Emerging from it, the foreground silhouette is vibrant and alive with a radiant kintsugi effect, where delicate, glowing gold leaf lines trace the contours, symbolizing the beautiful mending of past wounds into sources of strength. The surrounding space is filled with a gentle wash of warm, celebratory colorsâ€”peach, soft rose, and sunny goldâ€”blending seamlessly into one another. Delicate, hand-painted wildflowers, like resilient poppies and joyful sunflowers, appear to grow from the golden lines, symbolizing new growth and blossoming self-love. The overall effect is deeply personal, tender, and triumphant, capturing the beauty of a soul gratefully acknowledging its own journey.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Thank you for gifting me with a great future and present and past" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in a luminous and ethereal watercolor style, depicting two overlapping silhouettes. The background silhouette, rendered in soft, muted grays and cool blues, subtly evokes past struggles, like a fading memory. Emerging from it, the foreground silhouette is vibrant and alive with a radiant kintsugi effect, where delicate, glowing gold leaf lines trace the contours, symbolizing the beautiful mending of past wounds into sources of strength. The surrounding space is filled with a gentle wash of warm, celebratory colorsâ€”peach, soft rose, and sunny goldâ€”blending seamlessly into one another. Delicate, hand-painted wildflowers, like resilient poppies and joyful sunflowers, appear to grow from the golden lines, symbolizing new growth and blossoming self-love. The overall effect is deeply personal, tender, and triumphant, capturing the beauty of a soul gratefully acknowledging its own journey.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a luminous and ethereal watercolor style, depicting two overlapping silhouettes. The background silhouette, rendered in soft, muted grays and cool blues, subtly evokes past struggles, like a fading memory. Emerging from it, the foreground silhouette is vibrant and alive with a radiant kintsugi effect, where delicate, glowing gold leaf lines trace the contours, symbolizing the beautiful mending of past wounds into sources of strength. The surrounding space is filled with a gentle wash of warm, celebratory colorsâ€”peach, soft rose, and sunny goldâ€”blending seamlessly into one another. Delicate, hand-painted wildflowers, like resilient poppies and joyful sunflowers, appear to grow from the golden lines, symbolizing new growth and blossoming self-love. The overall effect is deeply personal, tender, and triumphant, capturing the beauty of a soul gratefully acknowledging its own journey.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a greeting card with a stylized, illustrative art style reminiscent of a warm, vintage comic book or animation. The color palette is dominated by deep, textured browns and oranges for the seating and background, contrasting with warm golden yellows emanating from the upper portion of the image, creating a sense of triumph and illumination. The foreground features a young woman with long, dark hair, a confident smile, and dark eyes, wearing a dark top and simple jewelry, holding a small, square card that reads \"self-creation begins here.\" She is seated at a table, suggesting a moment of reflection or a new beginning. Behind her, and slightly above, are two figures: a younger, determined-looking woman in a dark outfit, wielding a mallet and chisel, actively sculpting a rough form. Emerging from this sculpted form is a luminous, serene, ethereal female silhouette glowing with golden light, representing the accomplished self. The overall mood is inspirational and empowering, capturing a journey of transformation and self-made success. The text \"congratulations\" is displayed at the very top in a flowing, elegant, slightly golden handwritten script.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a greeting card with a simple, elegant design. It features a subtle, textured background in warm, muted tones, hinting at the overall aesthetic of the card. In the center-left area, a single, stylized, glowing golden wildflower, similar to those subtly suggested in the interior, is depicted with delicate brushstrokes. The rest of the background is largely clear, with the bottom-right corner intentionally left blank and undecorated to accommodate a QR code. The mood is serene and conclusive, providing a quiet artistic finish that complements the card's inspirational theme without being overly elaborate. No text or characters are present.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior of a greeting card, continuing the visual narrative with a warm, textured, illustrative art style. The background transitions from darker tones at the bottom to a bright, radiant golden glow at the top, symbolizing progress and achievement. Abstract, swirling shapes in soft, muted yellows, oranges, and hints of gold evoke the feeling of overcoming past struggles and embracing a brighter future. Delicate, almost ethereal lines of glowing gold trace abstract contours, suggesting resilience and inner strength. Scattered amongst these abstract elements are stylized, hand-painted wildflowers, such as small poppies and abstract sunflower shapes, rendered in warm peach and rose hues, symbolizing growth and blossoming self-love. The overall impression is one of gentle transformation and the unfolding of potential, maintaining a cohesive, uplifting, and inspirational tone with a focus on abstract, symbolic representation. No text or characters are present.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior of a greeting card, serving as the climax of the visual story. The art style is consistent with the rest of the card: warm, illustrative, with textured backgrounds and a prominent golden glow. The central focus is the message \"Thank you for gifting me with a great future and present and past\" rendered in a beautiful, flowing, legible handwritten cursive script in a rich, dark ink, appearing as if written with a calligraphy pen. This message is elegantly framed by abstract, organic decorative elements that echo the golden, luminous lines and subtle wildflower motifs from the left interior. These decorative elements are rendered in soft washes of peach, rose, and gold, creating a harmonious and aesthetically pleasing composition that enhances the heartfelt message. The overall mood is deeply personal, celebratory, and grateful, providing an emotional peak for the card's narrative."
}
```
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a greeting card with a minimalist and serene artistic style. The composition features a gentle, almost ethereal wash of soft peach and cream colors that blend seamlessly into a pale yellow background, creating a warm and calming atmosphere. A single, stylized, luminous yellow square, textured like a small gem or a perfectly crafted building block, is centrally placed on the open palm of a subtly rendered, neutral-toned hand. This hand, depicted with soft shading and gentle curves, appears to be offering or holding this precious element. The overall aesthetic is extremely clean and uncluttered, conveying a sense of peace and quiet accomplishment. There is no text, and the design elements are concentrated towards the center and left, leaving the bottom-right corner completely clear, as if reserved for a QR code. This design serves as a simple yet sophisticated conclusion, subtly echoing the theme of holding something precious and valuable, a quiet culmination of the card's inspirational journey. The style is flat 2D artwork for printing, with a full-bleed background.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a congratulations greeting card with a dynamic, abstract swirling design. The artwork is rendered in a thick, impasto-like oil painting style, with visible brushstrokes creating a textured, almost mosaic-like appearance. The composition features a powerful central vortex, beginning in the lower left and spiraling upwards and towards the right. This vortex is a brilliant, radiant glow of warm colors, dominated by vivid oranges, bright yellows, and golden hues, suggesting energy and a bright future. As the spiral moves outward, it transitions into cooler tones of deep teal, earthy browns, and dark, shadowy blues on the outer edges, creating a sense of depth and the overcoming of challenges. The elements are arranged in semi-circular, segmented patterns, reminiscent of stained glass or layered tiles, with distinct outlines between each color block. This creates a highly stylized and graphic feel, yet the painterly texture keeps it warm and artistic. The overall mood is one of energetic transformation and triumphant emergence from darkness into light. The color palette is a harmonious blend of warm and cool tones, unified by the bold brushwork and the central radiating light. There is no text or characters on this interior page. The design is full-bleed with a 9:16 aspect ratio.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with handwritten text. The background is a soft, blended wash of peach and orange watercolor, creating a warm and luminous feel. Dominating the center of the page is the handwritten message, "Thank you for gifting me with a great future and present and past," rendered in a beautiful, flowing, teal-colored cursive script. The typography is elegant, legible, and has a natural, heartfelt character with slight variations in line weight, evoking sophisticated calligraphy. The design is framed by decorative elements on the top left and bottom right corners. These decorative elements consist of a mosaic-like pattern of small, square tiles in vibrant blues, teals, and oranges, outlined with delicate gold. Some tiles are arranged in a denser, tessellated pattern near the corner, while others scatter outwards, appearing to float and fade into the watercolor background. This decorative framing creates a sense of depth and artistry without overwhelming the central message space, allowing the handwritten text to be the focal point. The overall aesthetic is inspirational, sophisticated, and deeply personal, with the mosaic motif symbolizing a beautiful, pieced-together journey.
